net.morimekta.providence.config

Class ProvidenceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.morimekta.providence.config.ProvidenceConfig

  • public class ProvidenceConfig
extends Object
    Providence config loader. This loads providence configs.

      • getSupplierWithParent

        public <M extends PMessage<M,F>,F extends PField> Supplier<M> getSupplierWithParent(File file,
                                                                                    Supplier<M> parent)
                                                                             throws IOException
        Load providence config from the given file, and with a defined parent config. The parent config comes from a supplier, so does not need to be a providence config per se. The loaded config will not be updated when the parent config is updated, as there is no known "upward" dependency. Therefore this should only be used for non-changing config, and for top-level config that does not depend on listening to upstream config changes.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The message type.
        F - The message field type.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to load.
        parent - The parent message for the config to inherit.
        Returns:
        Supplier for the parsed and merged config.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the file could not be read.
        TokenizerException - If the file could not be parsed.

      • getSupplierWithParent

        public <M extends PMessage<M,F>,F extends PField> Supplier<M> getSupplierWithParent(File configFile,
                                                                                    File parentFile)
                                                                             throws IOException
        Load providence config from the given file, and with a defined parent config. The parent config must come from an already loaded config file.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The message type.
        F - The message field type.
        Parameters:
        configFile - The file to load.
        parentFile - The parent config file.
        Returns:
        Supplier for the parsed and merged config.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the file could not be read.
        TokenizerException - If the file could not be parsed.
